910740.name: HOKUSAI Demo
910740.description:
This is an illustration generator software that you can create illustrations by means of making combinations of items.

* You need only easy mouse control.
* You can import external materials (assets).
* You can create your original assets with an editor.

* For details, please visit the official page.
* Please try the free trial version to check the performance in your PC and feel the functions and usability of HOKUSAI before purchase.

[Contents]
- HOKUSAI (Illustration Generator Software)
- Asset Editor
- Sample data for confirmation

* This software assumes that you import assets created by users.

[About The Trial Version]
The trial version cannot import more than 3 assets.
Only one default font can be used.
Asset Editor is identical to the retail version.
